title: Properties of the net force on the block at C

content.question: Which of the following is true of the net force on the block when it is at position C ?

choices.label: It is directed vertically downward only.
It is directed vertically upward only.
It is directed to the left only.
It is directed to the right only.
It has components both to the left and vertically downward.

content.answer: It has components both to the left and vertically downward.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
